page.title: 08 THE BUTTERLEIGH INN
page.content: The Butterleigh Inn was built in 1550. It was called the New Inn.No big alterations have been made since it was built.They mainly have regular customers from this area and Tiverton and Cullompton.The number of customers a day varies between 3_50.They hold dinner parties and hunt meets but no discos. They sell{bar snacks }which are very popular,such as lasagne,burgers and chilli.They also offer{accommodation.} The pub takes part in darts and skittles competitions. Inside the pub there are some very interesting notices on the walls.One is advertising a{Donkey Derby }event in 1867 (this still takes place today).Another one is a {Deed of {Purchase}of the pub in 1709.
